items.name: EvCAT
items.info: Event Category, if >0:  e-, e-p, e-pi+.....

items.name: NPGP
items.info: Number of Final (Timed-based) Reconstructed Particles*100 + Number of Geometrically Reconstructed Particles

items.name: TRG
items.info: Trigger Type (CLAS12_e-, FT_CLAS12_h, CLAS12_H,...) + Prescale Factor for that Trigger

items.name: TSett
items.info: T_settle, if set, helicity is uncertain

items.name: Pattern
items.info: Start of each pattern for beam helicity

items.name: HelicD
items.info: Actual reported helicity, delayed by n-windows

items.name: status
items.info: particle status (represents detector collection it passed)

items.name: index
items.info: index of the hit in the specific detector bank

items.name: pindex
items.info: row number in the particle bank hit is associated with

items.name: detector
items.info: Detector ID, defined in COATJAVA DetectorType

items.name: hx
items.info: X coordinate of the matched hit

items.name: hy
items.info: Y coordinate of the mathced hit

items.name: hz
items.info: Z coordinate of the matched hit

items.name: path
items.info: Path from vertex to the hit position
